snippet: The United States Mail steamer Florida, Capt. LYON, arrived at this port yesterday morning, in 68 hours from Savannah. The steamship Southerner, Capt. DICKINSON, also arrived this morning, in 65 hours form Charleston, She brings $125,000 in specie...
lead_paragraph: The United States Mail steamer Florida, Capt. LYON, arrived at this port yesterday morning, in 68 hours from Savannah. The steamship Southerner, Capt. DICKINSON, also arrived this morning, in 65 hours form Charleston, She brings $125,000 in specie.
